<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="People Info Default">690362c73b1e3210bc1ccdd643e45a05</macroponent><name>spouse_input_passport_no/now_default/manageInvalid</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const {
        spouseForm,
        spouseFormSubmitted
    } = api.state;
    const nationality = api.data.look_up_nationality.results.find( item => item._row_data.uniqueValue === spouseForm.nationality);
    if (nationality.nationality_th.value !== 'ไทย') {
        return true;
    }
    
    return false;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-19 04:05:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>597c511d3ba2b250bc1ccdd643e45abe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>spouse_input_passport_no/now_default/manageInvalid</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_597c511d3ba2b250bc1ccdd643e45abe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-19 04:05:36</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
